copyFile

public boolean copyFile(NodeEntry downloaderNode,
                        NodeEntry uploaderNode,
                        int file,
                        int maxBytes)
Copy a file identified by fileIndex from the source to destination. The transfer could fail if the source does not have the file or if the destination node has fully utilized its storage.

Parameters:
downloaderNode - the node which wants to download (destination)
uploaderNode - the node which has the file (uploader)
file - the file to be downloaded
Returns:
true if the file is now complete.
